## Brush.DeepClone method

Creates a new deep clone of the current [`Brush`](../../brush).

```csharp
public virtual Brush DeepClone()
```

### Return Value

A new [`Brush`](../../brush) which is the deep clone of this [`Brush`](../../brush) instance.
